summary: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.
cast: David Spade|John Goodman|Eartha Kitt|Patrick Warburton|Wendie Malick|Kellyann Kelso|Eli Russell Linnetz|Stephen J. Anderson|Bob Bergen|Rodger Bumpass|Robert Clotworthy|Jennifer Darling|Patti Deutsch|John Fiedler|Miriam Flynn|Geri Lee Gorowski|Jess Harnell|Sherry Lynn|Danny Mann|Mickie McGowan|D.F. Reynolds|Andre Stojka|Steve Susskind|Joe Whyte|Mark Dindal|Tom Jones|Patrick Pinney
title: El emperador y sus locuras
